description: This script ensures the existence of a specific SQLite database schema for a notes application. It reads the database path from a configuration file, applies the necessary SQL Data Definition Language (DDL) statements to create or upgrade the 'notes' table, and can be run as a standalone utility.

methods.name: str _get_db_path_from_connection_file(connection_file: str = "db_connection.txt")
methods.description: Reads the database file path from 'db_connection.txt' or returns a default value if the file does not exist.

methods.name: None ensure_notes_schema(db_path: str)
methods.description: Creates or upgrades the 'notes' table in the SQLite database to the minimal required schema.

methods.name: None main()
methods.description: Main entry point that retrieves the database path and ensures the notes schema exists.
